Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Kids' Reflex Climbing Shoe - 30 - Yellow / Black
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Scarpa Kids' Reflex Climbing Shoe Comfortable, Highly breathable, and washable stretch-knit Upper A flat and neutral last Low angled toe box PAF heel system that reduces forward pressure to ensure happy, growing feet Weight: 4.6 oz

Product.Product_Name: Tenaya Masai Climbing Shoes - 11.5 - Yellow / Red
Product.Long_Description: The Tenaya Masai Climbing Shoes Are designed with micro-edges in mind - these bad boys feature a 4mm Vibram XS Grip rubber sole and narrow construction so all the power is in your toes. The full-length lace closure means you can fully customize your Fit so you get exactly what you need. Features of the Tenaya Masai Climbing Shoe The Masai is designed to climb everything, and to climb it well. On long multipitch routes, you encounter many types of terrain, and you need a single shoe that can excel everywhere and remain comfortable. The Masai is built on a narrower, more symmetrical last than the other Tenaya models, and it delivers edging power like no other. A supportive mid-sole keeps your confidence level High and your feet feeling strong throughout the day, and the low-volume heel creates a snug Fit. Climbers around the world count on the Masai when they need to know exactly what to expect from their shoe, every time: power, precision, and comfort. SXR Dynamics system conforms with your foot using the designs elements of the sole and overall structure of the hoe, which makes the shoe even more responsive and provides unparalleled power and precision.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Men's Genius Shoe - 45.5 - Red
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Men's Genius Shoe is an unlined Climbing shoe for tackling the crag. Suede leather and microfiber create a soft Upper that forms to your foot and since it's unlined you can feel every bit of rock under each foothold. The 3mm Vibram XS Grip2 sole is nice and sticky and the laces tighten to your preference for a secure hold. Features of the La Sportiva Men's Genius Shoe NO-EDGE Technology delivers unparalleled edging Performance on the rock P3 patented Technology maintains the downturned shape of the shoe and delivers mind bending power Lace-Up comfort makes this shoe Fit every type of foot Vibram XS Grip2 sole is the hardest and stickiest rubber on the market and provides superior edging ability and smearing Performance Slip lasted construction gives you excellent sensitivity for feeling those edges

Product.Product_Name: Tenaya Tarifa Climbing Shoe - 12 - White / Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The Tenaya Tarifa Climbing Shoe offers the balance you need, whether you?re Climbing on vertical slab or on overhanging sport routes. This shoe offers a slightly stiffer in the toes and heels for better power, yet flexible in the Midsole for smearing. Features of the Tenaya Tarifa Climbing Shoe Speed-lace system offers quick entry with the precision Fit of a lace-up. 3.5mm Vibram XS Grip rubber provides unmatched friction and durability. Narrow last and mid-stiff Midsole Are sensitive enough for steep terrain, but hold up to the demands of vertical edging on tiny holds. RB Range X Technology created a dynamic response and provides perfect balance between comfort and Performance, making Climbing feel both easier and more intuitive. SXR Dynamics system conforms with your foot using the designs elements of the sole and overall structure of the hoe, which makes the shoe even more responsive and provides unparalleled power and precision.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Vapor Climbing Shoe - 35.5 - Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Vapor Climbing Shoe is a lace up Climbing shoe for trad routes. An asymmetric shape and stiff, moderate downturned profile keeps your feet sticking on tiny ledges and cracks. The Vibram; XS Edge rubber Outsole is 3.5mm thick and sticky for gripping rock. Features of the Scarpa Vapor Climbing Shoe Medium charged Bi-Tension Active randing provides comfort Vibram XS Edge provides incredible grip and durability Full length Outsole Single piece synthetic Upper reduces stretch Luxurious padded tongue ensures all-day cushioning

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Women's Vapor Climbing Shoe - 35 - Maldive
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Scarpa Women's Vapor Climbing Shoe Medium charged Bi-Tension Active Randing provides comfort Vibram XS Edge provides incredible grip and durability Full length Outsole Single piece synthetic Upper reduces stretch Luxurious padded tongue ensures all-day cushioning

Product.Product_Name: Butora Altura Climbing Shoe - 9 / Tight Fit - Orange
Product.Long_Description: The Butora Altura Climbing Shoe was designed with all day comfort in mind for those multipitch and trad days. The enclosed toe lace-up system protects the shoelaces from abrasion and the mid-top design provides more stability for your ankles. Slip your foot into the German hydrovelour split leather with 100% organic hemp lining to experience crazy comfort. Features of the Butora Altura Climbing Shoe Enclosed toe lace-up system protects shoelaces from abrasion, slip last construction will give you all day Performance and comfort German hydrovelour split leather with 100% organic hemp lining prevents stretch and odor while providing durability Moisture-wicking split-leather foot bed. The tongue is made from breathable mesh and cushy poron for maximum comfort Size up half-size for a tight, aggressive Fit, or full-size for more comfortable Fit

Product.Product_Name: Butora Women's Libra Climbing Shoe - 7.5 / Tight Fit - Print
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Butora Women's Libra Climbing Shoe Injection Molded PU Midsole Hemp lining Rubber Outsole

Product.Product_Name: Butora Mantra Climbing Shoe - 12.5 / Tight Fit - Orange
Product.Long_Description: The Butora Mantra Climbing Shoe is designed with crack and trad climbers in mind. This shoe Features built-in Poron memory foam padding to protect your feet while jamming, and the asymmetrical Fit allows for all day comfort. Please note, the Green color is for wide Fit and the Orange color is for a narrow Fit. Features of the Butora Mantra Climbing Shoe Built-in Poron memory foam padding to protect your foot and allow comfortable jamming Asymmetrical last and stiff Midsole provide all-day support German hydrovelour split leather foot-bed for comfort Green - Wide Fit Orange - Tight Fit

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Women's Maestro Mid Climbing Shoe - 36.5 - Malva/Milk
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Women's Maestro Mid Climbing Shoe is a versatile shoe for trad climbs. With the mid height your foot gets more protection up at the ankle from the sharp rocks. The IPC-Tension; rand offers support and sticky Vibram; XS Edge rubber grips the rock as you move from foothold to crack to foothold. Features of the Scarpa Women's Maestro Mid Climbing Shoe Premium eco leather inreases durability, comfort and helps alleviate the environmental impact of the tanning process Innovative fabric pattern of the Upper relocates stitching for increased over-toe comfort New active rand, the IPC-Tension, provides an innovative solution to increase all-day support without compromising Performance Over lace protection The first female-specific mid-top on the market

Product.Product_Name: Red Chili Sausalito Climbing Shoe - 6.5 - Glowing Red
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Red Chili Sausalito Climbing Shoe New padding in the heel Area ensures maximum comfort Antibacterial Footbed made from hemp which effectively blocks odors Fits almost anyone looking for a super comfortable Climbing shoe and it?s also suitable for climbers with problematic feet

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Men's Niad Lace Climbing Shoe - 13 - Core Black / Crew Red / Acid Mint
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Five Ten Men's Niad Lace Climbing Shoe Upper: Lyliane microfiber Midsole: 2mm full length Bontex laminated with 0,5mm TPU sheet Outsole: 3.5 mm stealth C4 Outsole for optimal grip

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Women's Niad Lace Climbing Shoe - 11 - Core Black / Crew Red / Acid Mint
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Five Ten Women's Niad Lace Climbing Shoe Lyliane microfiber 2mm full length Bontex laminated with 0,5mm TPU sheet 3.5 mm Stealth C4 Outsole for optimal grip

Product.Product_Name: Tenaya Tanta Lace Climbing Shoe - 5.5 - Black/Blue
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Tenaya Tanta Lace Climbing Shoe Handmade in Spain Lace-up harness for the most precise Fit adjustment Slight downturned toe for Performance paired with a less aggressive heel cup for all day comfort Ideal for logging gym mileage, all day use, sport Climbing, bouldering Synthetic leather, Cotton liner

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Mago Climbing Shoe - 35.5 - Black
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Scarpa Mago Climbing Shoe Mago is the ultimate weapon for modern sporl Climbing Innovative materials and further refined Technologies perfect this High-Performance model Supportive lace-up in our Specialized Performance Category, and truly excels on micro edges on steep demanding routes Upper: Microfiber Soft Touch + Alcantara Midsole: TPS Insert Outsole: Vibram XS Grip 2 (3.5 mm) Last: FZC Highly Downlurned, Highly Asymmetric Narrow-width, High angel toe box and medium volume heel cup

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Men's Miura VS Shoe - 38 - Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Men's Miura VS Shoe is a Climbing shoe for sport routes, gym Climbing, bouldering, as well as Technical face Climbing. The Miura VS is everything you love about the original Miura, with an easy on/easy off Velcro closure. The leather Upper stretches just enough to conform to your foot while the synthetic lining on the inside controls the amount of stretch. The bottom of the foot is unlined for better awAreness against the rock. The High asymmetry allows for better pocket Climbing and the XS Edge rubber allows for Technical edging. The durable and resistant rubber keeps them going strong. Velcro isn't just for toddlers. Features of the La Sportiva Men's Miura VS Shoe Easy to use hook and loop closure system for easy on and off convenience Slingshot rand and power hinge system gives you the ultimate edging power 4mm vibram XS Edge sticky rubber Outsole One-piece leather Upper has a synthetic Dentex lining to control stretch Unlined under the foot to allow for excellent sensitivity on micro edges and smears Built on the P3 platform which maintains the downturned shape of the shoe making it excellent for steep overhangs Slip lasted construction gives these more sensitivity, allowing you to focus your foot strength on the smallest of edges

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Boostic Climbing Shoe - 35.5 - Parrot/Spring/Turquoise
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Boostic Climbing Shoe is a synthetic and suede shoe for Climbing. Suede at the heel for comfort with a synthetic at the front of the foot so it won't overstretch throughout the life of the shoe. A V-Tension Active Randing delivers grip in the toe with a Vibram; XS Edge rubber at the sole. Stiff and aggressive for your Technical Climbing needs. Features of the Scarpa Boostic Climbing Shoe Special soft rubber, High friction toe patch for toe hooking Built for maximum toe power for steep vert or overhangs Precise heel Fit and sticky rubber for exceptional heel hooking Floating closure straps accommodate all foot shapes Vibram XS Edge provides incredible grip and durability

Product.Product_Name: Tenaya Inti Climbing Shoes - 12 - White / Black
Product.Long_Description: The Tenaya Inti Climbing Shoes Are designed with versatility in mind. The Vibram XS Grip sole and sensitivity of the shoe means that you can stand on virtually any hold. The moderate downturn lends to precision and comfort, while the Dual hook and loop closure lets you pop them on and off within seconds. Features of the Tenaya Inti Climbing Shoes The Inti is a powerhouse in a sensitive and comfortable package. Whether you?re looking for a High quality first pair of shoes or an all-around performer for a season of projecting, the Inti has you covered. It Features a similar last to the Ra, but with a slightly narrower and lower volume Fit. Vibram XS Grip rubber is the leader in Performance and durability, and will keep you secure on tiny edges and slick smears. The quality construction shines through the lifespan and dependability of this shoe ? expect consistent Performance that outlasts the comPetition. SXR Dynamics system conforms with your foot using the designs elements of the sole and overall structure of the shoe, which makes the shoe even more responsive and provides unparalleled power and precision.

Product.Product_Name: Tenaya Ra Climbing Shoes - 12.5 - White / Orange
Product.Long_Description: The Tenaya Ra Climbing Shoes Are ideal for vertical and moderately overhanging routes and boulder problems, with a reinforced toe-box and a moderately curved silhouette. All-around Performance means you can use these for virtually any project. Features of the Tenaya Ra Climbing Shoe The Ra's slightly downcambered last and low volume heel provide incredible power in the toe-box and a responsiveness like you?ve never felt. Toe-in and smear with confidence thanks to the Vibram XS Grip rubber. The cotton lining and synthetic Upper ensure you always know what to expect out of your Tenayas, because stretch is almost non-existent. The Ra Features the most versatile Fit of the Tenaya line, with a mid-volume and mid-width last. SXR Dynamics system conforms with your foot using the designs elements of the sole and overall structure of the hoe, which makes the shoe even more responsive and provides unparalleled power and precision.

Product.Product_Name: Tenaya Oasi Climbing Shoes - 11.5 - White / Blue
Product.Long_Description: Features of Tenaya Oasi Climbing Shoes Highly aggressive shoe suited on steep climbs, but you will immediately notice the edging and smearing Performance The 3.5mm Vibram XS Grip Outsole and Highly sensitive Midsole make the Oasi feel like an extension of your foot Synthetic Upper and cotton lining RB Range X Technology created a dynamic response and provides perfect balance between comfort and Performance, making Climbing feel both easier and more intuitive. SXR Dynamics system conforms with your foot using the designs elements of the sole and overall structure of the hoe, which makes the shoe even more responsive and provides unparalleled power and precision. Draxor system is a fast and efficient lacing system with double backed straps that alleviate tension on the velcro fastener while providing an extremely fine-tuned Fit. Uppers: Microfibre Closure System: Velcro, patented Draxtor system Tongue: Lycra, two-layer and bidirectional

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Men's Force V Climbing Shoe - 44 - Mangrove/Papaya
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Men's Force V Climbing Shoe is a comfortable shoe that doesn't skimp on Climbing Performance. A flat last combined with a suede Upper delivers a shoe that keeps you Climbing all day long. Less tired feet, plus a Vibram; XS Edge 4mm sole to grip the rock like the mountain goat you're pretending to be. Features of the Scarpa Men's Force V Climbing Shoe Low charged V-Tension Active Randing conserves energy for all day efficiency Vibram XS Edge provides incredible grip durability Technical flat-lasted construction delivers all-day comfort and Performance Snug heel cup and padded mesh tongue ensures day long cushioning Dual power strap closure allows maximum adjustability

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Women's Force V Climbing Shoe - 40.5 - Ice Fall/Mandarin Red
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Women's Force V Climbing Shoe is an all-around rock shoe focused on comfort and durability. Its flat-lasted design is suitable all-day wear whether tackling a bouldering problem, crack Climbing, or taking on more Technical ascents. The tough suede Upper offers enduring Performance that holds up climb after climb. Complete with the Vibram; XS Edge sole, these shoes provide excellent grip on sheer rock faces and support for toeing along Slim ledges. Features of the Scarpa Women's Force V Climbing Shoe Low charged V-Tension Active Randing conserves energy for all day efficiency Vibram XS Edge provides incredible grip durability Technical flat-lasted construction delivers all-day comfort and Performance Snug heel cup and padded mesh tongue ensures day long cushioning Dual power strap closure allows maximum adjustability

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Men's Futura Climbing Shoe - 45 - Blue / Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Men's Futura Climbing Shoe is a rock Climbing shoe made for pushing the limit. The aggressive downturn is geAred toward advanced climbers, enabling the High-end Performance needed for tough bouldering problems, sport Climbing and Technical trad. Featuring No-Edge construction, these shoes Are designed to enhance sensitivity so you can really feel the rock and deliver power from all angles. Complete with Vibram XS Grip3 rubber, you have plenty of stickiness for smearing and the durability needed to send it over and over again. Features of the La Sportiva Men's Futura Climbing Shoe Modern Climbing shoe with no-edge Technology Ideal for Technical footwork and precise edging Rubber improves upon the superior grip characteristics of Vibram XS GRIP, and delivers outstanding precision of support and shape stability Technical randing system developed to deliver power to the sole and to maintain the down-turned shape of the shoe

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Women's Futura Climbing Shoe - 38.5 - Jade Green / White
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Women's Futura Climbing Shoe is a Performance shoe for Technical Climbing. Serious climbers deserve better edging and lots of sensitivity in order to feel close to the rock. No-Edge Technology delivers exactly what you need when moving upwards. A snug Fit is delivered with the Fast Lacing System with hook and loop closure. Features of the La Sportiva Women's Futura Climbing Shoe Modern Climbing shoe with no-edge Technology Ideal for Technical footwork and precise edging Rubber improves upon the superior grip characteristics of Vibram XS GRIP, and delivers outstanding precision of support and shape stability Technical randing system developed to deliver power to the sole and to maintain the down-turned shape of the shoe

Product.Product_Name: Butora Acro Climbing Shoe - 13.5 / Tight Fit - Blue
Product.Long_Description: The Butora Acro Climbing Shoe is an aggressively downturned shoe ideal for steep Climbing and bouldering. The High-tensioned heel rand brings power to the front toe for superior eding, while the combination of soft synthetic and natural leather on the Upper make it surprisingly comfortable. The unique triple fork hook and loop closure means you can customize your Fit. Features of the Butora Acro Climbing Shoe High-tensioned heel rand brings power to thefront toe for superior edging. Butora?s signature triple fork hook and loop strap gives you the convenience of a slipper with security and custom Fit of a lace-up shoe Butora Neo Friction rubber sole Full ABS mid-sole Orange - Wide Fit Blue - Tight fight

Product.Product_Name: Butora Men's Endeavor Climbing Shoe - 8.5 Wide - Moss
Product.Long_Description: The Butora Men?s Endeavor Climbing Shoe Features a flat silhouette, ideal for all around Climbing whether its at the crag or the gym. These shoes have a Dual hook and loop closure system to ensure a dialed in and comfortable Fit, while the 100% organic hemp lining minimizes stretch and stench. Features of the Butora Men's Endeavor Climbing Shoe Two-piece tongue is constructed of a Highly breathable mesh for comfort and ventilation. The tongue contains Poron memory foam and open cell sponge to absorb any pressure from the straps Front of the shoe is constructed of a synthetic micro fiber to help maintain its original shape and the back half of the shoe is made from natural leather for breathability and comfort Fully lined with 100% organic hemp fabric to minimize stretch while resisting odor development Moisture-wicking split-leather foot bed for comfort and custom Fit to your toes. 3D injection molded full lengths variable thickness polyurethane Midsole for torsion rigidity and precision edging Super sticky 100% butyl Butora F5 rubber sole

Product.Product_Name: Butora Women's Endeavor Climbing Shoe - 6 / Tight Fit - Lavender
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Butora Women's Endeavor Climbing Shoe Two-piece tongue is constructed of a Highly breathable mesh for comfort and ventilation. The tongue contains Poron memory foam and open cell sponge to absorb any pressure from the straps Front of the shoe is constructed of a synthetic micro fiber to help maintain its original shape and the back half of the shoe is made from natural leather for breathability and comfort Fully lined with 100% organic hemp fabric to minimize stretch while resisting odor development Moisture-wicking split-leather foot bed for comfort and custom Fit to your toes. 3D injection molded full lengths variable thickness polyurethane Midsole for torsion rigidity and precision edging Super sticky 100% butyl Butora F5 rubber sole

Product.Product_Name: Butora Narsha Climbing Shoe - 8.5 / Tight Fit - Blue
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Butora Narsha Climbing Shoe Unique heel and rand system stretching four ways for a Fit you can count on - no more heel slippage! Injection molded sole with formed arch support and 3D molded heel cup Beautifully designed toe cover made for toe hooking Internal NFS strap that allows for all day comfort or extreme precision - customize by tightening the strap High-quality German leather Nylon 66 stitching NEO Friction Rubber

Product.Product_Name: Red Chili Voltage LV Climbing Shoe - 5 - Orange / Red
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Red Chili Voltage LV Climbing Shoe Concept led to the creation of a brand new last that offers a spacious Fit Supports the toes Enables Climbing success and takes the joy of bouldering to a whole new level

Product.Product_Name: Tenaya Oasi LV Climbing Shoe - 6.5 - Black / Teal
Product.Long_Description: The Tenaya Oasi LV Climbing Shoes aggressive curve and low-angle toe-box makes this shoe an ideal choice on any vertical project you have. The construction and Vibram XS Grip 3.5mm sole allows for ultimate feedback. Features of the Tenaya Oasi LV Climbing Shoe Fastener: Velcro, Draxtor PAT system Tongue: Lycra with two perforated layers Lining: Cotton with TXT treatment Midsole: Double Midsole GI 1.8 y TST 150 Insole: TST multi-layer stretch tex Outsole: Vibram XS Grip 3.5 mm

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Men's Aleon Climbing Shoe - 11.5 - Active Red / Black / Grey One
Product.Long_Description: The Five Ten Men?s Aleon Climbing shoes were designed with the help of Fred Nicole (the first person to send V14), so you know they mean business. These shoes Are built for bouldering and sport routes with their medium-stiff construction. They feature Stealth C4 rubber with a moderate downturn to give you the confidence that you need while on routes that require precise edging and control. Plus, this shoe has a sock-like Fit for added sensitivity. Who doesn?t love a sensitive shoe?Features of the Five Ten Men's Aleon Climbing Shoe Regular Fit Hook-and-loop closure Adidas Primeknit textile Upper Textile lining; StealthA(R) C4 rubber Outsole for unbeatable grip Medium-stiff Midsole Sock-like construction hugs the foot Concave toe box for steep Climbing

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Furia S Climbing Shoe - 34.5 - Parrot/Yellow
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Scarpa Furia S Climbing Shoe IPR-Tension active rand connects the heel to forefoot Integrated Heel Cup in M50 rubber gives robust heel hooking Vibram XS Grip2 makes these shoes stick like glue Perfect for steep bouldering or sport Climbing

Product.Product_Name: Red Chili Voltage II Climbing Shoe - 7 - Red
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Red Chili Voltage II Climbing Shoe Rand form: asymmetric rand with aggressive downturn Closure system: integrated nylon eyelets with 2 offset VCR Straps Tongue: continuous stretch fabric for quick and easy on/offs Toe box: ultra-grip toe patch without adhesive rim Heel: Performance-Fit Heel with Vibram XS Grip Upper: synthetic, low stretch and dimensionally stable Midsole: RC-tension, soft, pre-shaped Midsole Footbed: Leather, optimal Fit and pleasant foot climate Sole: two-layered Vibram XS-Grip sole (4.5 mm) Weight: 490 g (pair) /size 7 (UK)

Product.Product_Name: Tenaya Women's Ra Climbing Shoe - 14 - Blue / Black
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Tenaya Women's Ra Climbing Shoe Specifically adapted to the anatomy of the female foot Created to find the balance between ultimate responsiveness and maximum transfer of power from the toes when standing on tiny footholds Rubber reinforced toe-box for superior for increased abrasion resistance and superior toe-hooking Easy to wear and obtain maximum precision on all types of difficult-to-use footholds The perfect balance of Features providing excellent Performance and all day comfort Moderately curved and precisely adjustable Quick and easy to put on and remove

Product.Product_Name: Red Chili Mystix Climbing Shoe - 8 - Snow
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Red Chili Mystix Climbing Shoe A High-end Climbing shoe with a powerful downturn for steep to extreme overhanging routes in the Climbing gym and at the crag Built on an aggressive and pointed last, the shoe allows very precise footwork on vertical and overhanging terrain Offers great support on small edges while remaining flexible enough to impress in modern bouldering gyms The strong downturn optimally supports the foot muscles in steep terrain The crossed Velcro strap closure system permits indiviDual adjustment with one quick pull Extra sensitive Vibram XS Grip sole The foot stays cool thanks to a breathable tongue made from fine, elastic knitted fabric

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Men's Reflex V Climbing Shoe - 46 - Black/Flame
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Scarpa Men's Reflex V Climbing Shoe Zonal stretch knit fabric Upper is breathable, supportive and washable SCARPA?s proprietary Vision(TM) rubber provides stick and durability Flat lasted construction for all-day comfort and Performance Dual power strap closure allows for maximum adjustability PAF Heel system improves all-day Fit and comfort Flat, slightly asymmetric last

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Women's Reflex V Climbing Shoe - 36.5 - Black/Ceramic
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Scarpa Women's Reflex V Climbing Shoe Zonal stretch knit fabric Upper is breathable, supportive and washable SCARPA?s proprietary Vision(TM) rubber provides stick and durability Flat lasted construction for all-day comfort and Performance Dual power strap closure allows for maximum adjustability PAF Heel system improves all-day Fit and comfort Flat, slightly asymmetric last

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten Men's Crawe Climbing Shoe - 8 - Core Black / White / Solar Red
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Five Ten Men's Crawe Climbing Shoe Unlined microfiber Upper with seamless primeknit closure system 1mm Bontex + 1.5 mm tensioned rubber to maintain shape over time 3.5 mm Stealth C4 Outsole for optimal grip

Product.Product_Name: Evolv Men's Zenist Climbing Shoe - 12.5 - Black / White
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Evolv Men's Zenist Climbing Shoe Vegan Friendly Downturned asymmetric profile Synthetic (Synthratex VX) Upper Unlined MX-R: 1.0mm half length rubber Midsole 4.2mm TRAX SAS Outsole VTR Rand (thicker front toe Area) Bouldering on modern gym style, smeary problems that require powerful body positions and all parts of the shoe

Product.Product_Name: Evolv Women's Zenist Climbing Shoe - 11 - White / Teal / Black
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Evolv Women's Zenist Climbing Shoe Vegan Friendly LV Downturned asymmetric profile Synthetic (Synthratex VX) Upper Unlined MX-R: 1.0mm half length rubber Midsole 4.2mm TRAX SAS Outsole VTR Rand (thicker front toe Area) Bouldering on modern gym style, smeary problems that require powerful body positions and all parts of the shoe

Product.Product_Name: Tenaya Indalo Climbing Shoe - 12 - Blue / Black
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Tenaya Indalo Climbing Shoe Super sticky rubber covers the Upper part of the toe-box and instep, providing both increased protection against abrasion and superior Performance when toe-hooking. Lightweight and breathable full bellows tongue that adapts to the anatomy of the foot and creates a comfortable barrier between the elastic on the shoeG??s instep and the skin. Two-part sole increases capacity to adapt to the form of the rock. Glove-like Fit. Precision Fit and design holds the arch and heel of the foot snugly and securely. Its design and applied Technology contribute to release pressure from the toes for a greater Climbing shoe control.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Women's Quantic Climbing Shoe - 39.5 - Dust Grey/Black
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Scarpa Women's Quantic Climbing Shoe Upper: Microsuede Insole: Flexan Midsole: HT-Tension Outsole: Vibram XS Edge (3.5mm) Last: (W) FKSW - Slighily Downturned, Slightly Asymmetric Vibram XS edge: Thanks to an improved resistance to plastic distortion, Vibram XS edge keeps its shape even after hours of use

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Men's Quantix SF Climbing Shoe - 44 - Bright Orange
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Scarpa Men's Quantix SF Climbing Shoe Ouantix SF presents precision Climbing in a brand-new way Innovative tension system holds the (oat from below like a hand ottering full length underfoot support Quantix SF's subtle downturn and more symmetrical shape provide a great balance of comfort and Performance across all styles of Climbing Upper: Microfiber, Soft Touch, Alcantara Midsole: Flexan Dynamic 1.4mm Outsole: Vibram XS Grip2 (3.5mm)

Product.Product_Name: Tenaya Arai Climbing Shoe - 6.5 - Teal / Black
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Tenaya Arai Climbing Shoe Maximum comfort but with many of the characteristics of a High Performance shoe. Very adaptable to various width of feet. Wide opening bellows tongue for ease of putting on and removing. Rubber reinforced toe-box for increased abrasion resistance and superior edging capabilities. Four micro-layer insole for perfect distribution of force.

Product.Product_Name: Tenaya Tanta Green Climbing Shoe - 8.5 - Black / Green
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Tenaya Tanta Green Climbing Shoe Comfortable introduction to High Performance Climbing shoes Slight downturn and moderate aggression for intermediate climbers Synthetic leather Upper reduces stretching TXT-treated cotton lining for breathability and anti-odor Moderately stiff Midsole with 4mm rubber sole for traction

Product.Product_Name: Tenaya Iati Climbing Shoe - 3.5 - White / Red
Product.Long_Description: The Tenaya Iati Climbing Shoe is an aggressive Climbing shoe for precision during the climb. An asymmetrical shape and curved downturn keep the Performance level High on vertical and overhanging routes, as well as bouldering. Constructed of leather and microfiber for durability and comfort, with a velcro closure system for easy security. Features of the Tenaya Iati Climbing Shoe Aggressively downturned toe-box giving superb precision in innumerable situations. Curved and structured form allowing a greater transmission of force on overhanging routes. Includes RBRX Technology enabling superior Fit and control together with the intimate feel and responsiveness necessary for minimal edging or friction holds. Microfibre and leather Upper and advanced construction Techniques eliminate unwanted movement and keep you in total control.
